text: The Condé Nast Building, also known as 4 Times Square, is a skyscraper in New York City, United States. It is 247 meters (809 feet) tall and has 48 floors. It was built in 1999 and is one of the tallest buildings in the world. ==Related pages== * List of tallest buildings in the world * List of tallest buildings in New York City == Other websites == * Emporis.com - 4 Times Square * SkycraperPage.com – Condé Nast Building Category:Skyscrapers in New York City Category:1999 establishments in the United States Category:1990s establishments in New York (state) Category:Buildings and structures in Manhattan
title: Condé Nast Building
